attributes.action: Look more closely into the cse report in oldham.
attributes.additional_details: I believe the victims of these failings deserve justice.
attributes.background: I want the government to look more closely into the failings of child sexual explotation in oldham.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about how reports of child exploitation in Oldham have been handled, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

There has already been an independent review into historic Child Sexual Exploitation in Oldham. You can read the findings of this review here: https://www.oldham.gov.uk/info/200386/protecting_children/2868/read_the_independent_review_into_historic_child_sexual_exploitation

The Leader of Oldham Council has accepted the findings of this report, and an 'extraordinary' council meeting has been scheduled to enable the issues raised by the report to be discussed: 
https://www.oldham.gov.uk/news/article/2302/independent_review_into_historic_child_sexual_exploitation_extraordinary_council_meeting

If you want to ask Oldham Council to take particular actions in response to this report, you can petition Oldham Council directly: https://committees.oldham.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx

If you want the UK Government to take action on this issue, we could accept a petition calling on the Government to launch a public inquiry into child exploitation in Oldham.
